name: Strayation
description:
We had something wonderful, then.
We had intimate, concrete knowledge of things beyond our reach.
We saw them, touched them, tasted them, became them, as easily as switching your grip on a steering wheel.
We carved out a place in this and all worlds, a place of safety and exploration beyond all measure.

We have strayed so far since then.

Models/animations/City level

Programming/models/Dungeon level
